comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss Elizabeth Simon, a cook in the Tatum household, testified in a society divorce case involving Jack Ottman, Dr. John C. Tatum and Mrs. Mary Jane Tatum, of Great Neck LI, in January 1915.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thank you for the information.  We may add it to the record.
